lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I believe in our human family.
lender.occupational_info: I gather the information necessary to help veterans obtain compensation for their disabilities incurred by military service

lender.name: Jerod
lender.loan_because: I'm not sure of the exact quote, but give a man a fish, he eats for a day, show him how to fish, he eats for a lifetime. To carry the metaphor further, I see this as a movement to enable that man or woman to buy the fishing pole. I think micro loans are a nonpartisan and potentially permanent solution to assisting people out of poverty situations.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a state government agency.

lender.name: Wilfried
lender.loan_because: Perhaps others can put my money to better use.
lender.occupational_info: I make the internet faster.

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help sometime.
lender.occupational_info: I design ads, coupons, logos... things that help promote someones services or products they may be trying to sell.

lender.name: Ayn
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people by giving them opportunities, motivation, and training (but not handouts!). The Frontline podcast featuring Kiva introduced me to this amazing organization. I first studied microfinance in college and have believed in its power since then. I admire all these entrepreneurs and want them to succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. government and, even when the bureaucracy frustrates me, I still believe we are making a positive difference in this world. Outside of my "job" my "work" includes mentoring a teenager in foster care (www.kidsave.org), coaching kids with special needs (www.keengreaterdc.org), and teaching leadership to teenagers (www.ayf.com).

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is a small step in the direction that Jesus wants me to take.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and i help people find homes to live in.

lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I am working at a private research insitute in Tokyo. Space application and disaster management is my main field.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone have a chance to make a living.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: who will if we don't???

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I think this is an awesome way to empower people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large Canadian media company. Most of the work I do is maintaining the technical operations and equipment.

lender.name: Sridhar
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to better their lives and are willing to work hard for that. I want to help people who are not looking for charity, just a helping hand until they are on their own.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: ..simply: It helps people. Period.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I believe to whom much is given much is expected. In the US, we have no idea how very fortunate we are. It is up to us given much to give back to keep the energy circulating and expanding.
lender.occupational_info: I share a home-business opportunity with those looking to take over their future and work at home.

lender.name: Nathaniel
lender.loan_because: I help people
lender.occupational_info: I own a company that makes vitamin and health products. I also pastor a church and have several spiritual websites.

lender.name: Pip
lender.loan_because: Being a Kiva lender gives me an opportunity to 'return' some of the wonderful open-hearted hospitality that has been extended to me during my travels.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work from home with my own small business making and selling cloth menstrual pads (and other eco-friendly, reusable products that I purchased wholesale) by mail order and at our local market. In retirement I am enjoying more time for vegetable gardening and being involved in activities within my community such as choir, tutoring and bushwalking.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I'm excited to see people using their skills to support themselves and make the world a better place to live for all of us!
lender.occupational_info: I help people to work together.

lender.occupational_info: I help develop websites and web applications that people use.

lender.loan_because: it helps people and is fun!

lender.name: Caleb

lender.name: David

lender.occupational_info: I am an international petroleum reservoir engineering consultant. I provide reservoir engineering, reservoir modelling and field development advice to oil and gas companies. My work has given me the privilege of working with wonderful people from all over the world. Working with Kiva is my small way of saying thanks.

lender.name: Marcin

lender.occupational_info: I work with computational biochemistry, mostly protein structure prediction. Work that needs to be done, so that major diseases and world hunger could be combated.

lender.occupational_info: I work with the managers of a big global bank, helping make decisions about strategy and they way our company is organized. This fall I will leave my job to attend business school and get an advanced degree.

lender.occupational_info:

lender.name: Vecchio Memorial
lender.occupation: Bob was a Professor and SMA Fellow
lender.loan_because:
A prodigious business scholar, Vecchio published numerous articles in the Journal of Applied Psychology, the Academy of Management Journal, the Academy of Management Review, Organizational Behavior and Human Decision Processes, Personnel Psychology, the Journal of Management, the Journal of Organizational Behavior, and Leadership Quarterly. He also served on the editorial boards of the Academy of Management Review, the Academy of Management Learning & Education Journal, the Journal of Management, Leadership Quarterly, the Journal of Occupational and Organizational Psychology, Group and Organization Management, Employee Responsibilities and Rights Journal, and other journals.
Vecchio was a fellow of the American Psychological Association, the Society for Industrial and Organizational Psychology, the Southern Management Association, and the American Psychological Society.
lender.occupational_info: This memorial initially created on behalf of the Southern Management Association Fellows

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I believe.

lender.loan_because: I can

lender.occupational_info: it's been very gratifying over the 65 years - just helping people

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help others. A friend sent me a gift certificate and alerted me to this organization, and I am glad that she did!

lender.name: Frank

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance at their dreams, no matter their financial situation, money should never be an obstacle to live out your dreams, and do better for yourself and family.
lender.occupational_info: I help place doctor's into our hospital by ensuring they are good and reliable doctors.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able too.
lender.occupational_info: I help make events happen.

lender.name: Deborah and Derek
lender.loan_because: microcredit is the best possible method of charitable giving. Not only does it provide an opportunity for those wishing to make a better life for themselves, it doesn't function as a "handout" as most charities do. The onus of success in on the lendee, and the results are often spectacular.
lender.occupational_info: Deborah is the Director of Evaluation for a local mental health agency in the Cincinnati area. Her job entails program improvement and outcome monitoring. Derek is a Ph.D. student in the Criminal Justice Division at the University of Cincinnati.

lender.name: Toan
lender.loan_because: I loan therefore I am. :)
lender.occupational_info: My research is in macroeconomic policies and economic development. Fight poverty with love!

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: We're all here now. We're all here together.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a high school history teacher; a world traveler; and an empathizer and lover of all.

lender.occupational_info: I am an emergency Medical Technician. I provide emergency medical care to those in need.

lender.occupational_info: I currently am a stay at home dad looking to start a business from home. I am in a situation riht now where my 2 year old son was abused and neglected now i am trying to get full custody.

lender.name: Teresa and Danny
lender.loan_because: I think it's a better, more efficient and more productive way of helping people than just giving money to charity.
lender.occupational_info: Kiva reaches their lenders through their website--it's a communication tool. I create websites for my clients to communicate with their clients and customers.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: As a woman, I want to support, encourage and empower other women in the world. I believe in them! Line upon line, precept upon precept, one by one, each of us can make a positive difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional photographer. I get to be passionately creative doing what I love. I am also a mother of five children who are my pride and joy.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: "To laugh often and much; to win the respect of intelligent people and the affection of children...to leave the world a better place...to know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived. This is to have succeeded." - Emerson
lender.occupational_info: I assist governments and businesses in making sound long-term financial decisions.

lender.loan_because: It's a small amount of money to me, but every little bit can help you.

lender.name: Kiva Japan
lender.loan_because: we want to help make the world a better place. 世の中をもっといいところにしたいから
lender.occupational_info: We were several groups all working toward the common goal of translating Kiva into Japanese when Matt, Kiva's founder, came to Japan in November 2008. He was like a magnet, drawing us all together, and we have been working as one group since then. Our version of the translated site is online...please check out the link below....いくつかのグループでKiva を日本語に訳す共通のゴールに向かって動いていた時、Kivaの創設者 Mattが昨年の１１月に来日しました。彼は磁石のように私たちを引き寄せて、それ例来一つになって行動ています。翻訳されたサイトがアップされます．．．．．下記のリンクをアクセスしてください。

lender.name: RAKADRI GHANA LTD
lender.loan_because:
Dear respected one ,
I am the owner of Rakadri GHANA LTD ,A member of the National Association of Sheanut Farmers Processors and Buyers of Ghana with a wide range of services in the CENTRAL ABABOU SUPPER MARKET OF TAMALE GHANA. We are looking for a loan or an investor for an amount of US$ 200,000.00 for business and if this investment proposal succeeds will establish a small unit that will be in charge of MICRO FINANCE and RURAL ENTERPRISE PROJECT DEVELOPMENT FINANCING .Our local women are looking for support to help them in their shea butter procesings , trade and others. Thank you
Ahmed rayan kadiri
MD of RAKADRI GHANA LTD TEL: 00233 243 646 155
lender.occupational_info: Member of the association of Shea nut farmers Processors and buyers of Ghana . I am a business man and one who helps in way to improve upon the life style of my people,especially the local market women.

lender.name: Hamish

lender.name: Patti Pokorchak
lender.loan_because:
I"ve been self-employed since 1992 and I feel that is the way to have greater control over your life. You determine what you will earn and how you will earn it. It is a lot of responsibility but also brings with it a lot of freedom and sense of pride.
I"ve traveled to several under-developed countries and realize how 'rich' we are here in N. America compared to others and want to share some of that richness to make others lives easier. I like to encourage those who look after themselves rather than waiting for social assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses become more profitable with my practical advice! I"ve worked in a number of different countries, industries and businesses, so have a wide knowledge base to draw from.

lender.name: Lexi
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Social Security Law firm for disabled clients. I read their medical records and write summaries to judges before their hearings.

lender.name: Rebekah Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide women an opportunity to realize their hopes for better and more secure lives.

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: need additional capital for buying various models of celfones at wholesale price.
lender.occupational_info: i am enjoying my business with big earning, what sad only is i can not expand my business as well as my income due to insufficient capital. If possible, i want to loan at least not lower than $2,000 in order for me to get different models of celfones at wholeale price. As of now, my celfone stock averages 6 units a day only. There were days, my wife and my staffs sell 6 units or more in just one day, forcing us to buy again in the city the following day. in that 6 units of celfone, i even need to divide it so that my other shop can also display celfone thus leaving only 3 celfone in my display rack. Profit in celfone bussiness is guaranteed here in my country Philippines because Philippines is number 1 text capital in the world.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I understand the passion and drive to work hard to provide for your family. Sometimes, a little help is needed to move forward.

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: "It is a great mistake to do nothing because you think you can do only a little." - I find this warning to be inspiring and it reflects my view of Kiva. This is a great example of empowering people to reach out and support one another toward pursuing positive goals. Thank you Kiva, for an opportunity to care for my fellow man/woman.
lender.occupational_info: I normally write computer programs used in electronic devices or machine control systems.
